channel.title: [tut] How to Multiple Log In! ON runescape 2 Pics Included!
channel.description:
[i][u]Information[/u][/i]
Things needed: 2 Windows that look like this ... [URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img152.imageshack.us/img152/4796/snap5lo0.png[/img][/URL] Difficulty: 5/10 (it takes practice) Average time: 1 min (depending on how fast you are)' Advantages: MUCH safer than drop trading on accounts Etc
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- [i][u][b]Directions![/b][/u][/i]
1) Get to runescape windows open like the one shown in picture. Now after you do that pick wich world you want to go in on both screens and wait for them to load up so on both pictures it should show this (dont have to use world im using im doing as example) Now it should look something like this ON BOTH SCREENS! [URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img475.imageshack.us/img475/6647/snap2pa2.png[/img][/URL]
2) Now Put your username that you want lets say like this (im going to use my 2 noob accounts) like so... [URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img444.imageshack.us/img444/5346/snap3pu5.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img251.imageshack.us/img251/5552/snap4xu2.png[/img][/URL]
3) now that you have it go to your 1st window (should be to the right depending on if your right handed) this will give you the most speed in clicking remember you have to do it fast!!!
4) EXTREMLEY QUICK click on your 1st window log in and then VERY FAST go to your second window and click log in! this may take you a few trys =)!
5) Now it should log both accounts in at the same time! however NEVER talk while you are Multiple logging but i advise you to turn [b]OFF[/b] private chat so your friends (sometimes there snitches)
6) NOW CLICK ON YOUR 1ST WINDow agin it should look like this....[URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://
7) now click your second window and it should look like this........[URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img480.imageshack.us/img480/1298/snap7qr7.png[/img][/URL]'
[URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img54.imageshack.us/img54/8688/snap6af3.png[/img][/URL]
[URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img167.imageshack.us/img167/407/snap7qh2.png[/img][/URL]
8) Now... it looks like this! [URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img366.imageshack.us/img366/9312/xb3gh3.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img366.imageshack.us/img366/315/army1hy5.png[/img][/URL]
8) CONGRATZ YOU'VE LEARNED AND DID MULTIPLE LOG IN!!!!!
Credits: 10% Runescape.........90% Cunit
DISCLAIMER: I dont not incuroge users of runescape to break the rules by Multiple logging. I am not responsible for any ban warning etc (not likley) that happens as a result of this.
btw... [b]IDC IF YOU KNOW HOW TO DO IT ALREADY! THIS IS FOR PEOPLE WHO DONT!!! if you do great i dont care dont post it! its pointless[/b]

item.title: [tut] How to Multiple Log In! ON runescape 2 Pics Included!
item.dc:creator: @Cunit Cunit
item.description:
@Cunit wrote:

Yea i know there’s many diff ways to multi-log this is just the way i learned to do it although i see if you change your java than your computer does run slower until you close the screen. so ill just stick with my method lol =) but it is a good way also

Read full topic

Things needed: 2 Windows that look like this …
Difficulty: 5/10 (it takes practice)
Average time: 1 min (depending on how fast you are)’
Advantages: MUCH safer than drop trading on accounts Etc

Directions!

  1. Get to runescape windows open like the one shown in picture. Now after you do that pick wich world you want to go in on both screens and wait for them to load up so on both pictures it should show this (dont have to use world im using im doing as example)
    Now it should look something like this ON BOTH SCREENS!

  4. EXTREMLEY QUICK click on your 1st window log in and then VERY FAST go to your second window and click log in! this may take you a few trys =)!
